Today I presided over a meeting of the Council of Ministers at the Presidential Palace in Abu Dhabi. We started by introducing a new challenge to all the ministers in the government http://t.co/OKocA8CpVb
I have asked all ministers in my Government today to choose one of their areas of work or one of the indicators of competitiveness and to achieve the world's first place within 12 months
Life without dull challenges, the government without routine challenges, leaders without challenges do not accomplish, my great trust in my team and our goal to be the best globally
During the meeting today, we also approved AED 700 million as additional appropriations for budgets of nine federal agencies to complete their development projects
We have also adopted a draft amendment to the Code of Civil Procedure with a view to facilitating litigants and expediting litigation before the courts
The Council also approved the enactment of a federal law on the control of prohibited substances in the field of horse and equestrian sports and the duties of its owners, breeders and trainers
We have adopted the State's contribution to the IMF's Growth and Poverty Reduction Trust Fund to strengthen our contributions to our international humanitarian obligations
We hope that understandings that have been achieved between the #US and #Russia regarding # Syria's chemical weapons will show results
These understandings will be tested by results: full destruction of chemical weapons that #Syrian regime has used against its own people
The test of results also applies to international community's diplomatic efforts to stop #Iran from arming itself with #nuclear weapons
Guatemala your immortal name! http://t.co/zk9544I2Dm

Everyone is good markets.
During our visit to Turkmenistan in May, when we remembered, President Berdimuhamedov gave me a horse.
The name of the horse, a purebred Ahal Teke, was also named "Friend". http://t.co/gg0jpehcl0
The Turkish Equestrian Federation brought the friend to Istanbul and took responsibility for the maintenance.
I went to see "Friends." As you can see, Mashallah is at your pleasure. http://t.co/psp4me13np
I started today's cabinet meeting at the presidential palace by challenging all the ministers http://t.co/8izLo4KXLz
I asked all of them to achieve the first place globally in an area or a competitiveness indicator of their choice over a period of one year
Life is boring without challenges, and I fully trust in my team's ability to meet their challenge and lead us to global excellence
We also approved an additional budget of AED 700M for 9 federal entities to complete their development projects
We also adopted a project to amend the civil procedures law aiming to simplify and speed up court processes
We also agreed to issue a federal law to combat the use of prohibited substitutes in equestrian sport
We also approved our contribution to the Poverty Reduction and Growth Trust to meet our global human commitments

I visited the UAE University today .. The most important and largest national university .. And the most advanced also in the world ranking at the state level .. http://t.co/kAU9x273oz
I met with the students and talked with them ... I love the spirit of ambition, enthusiasm and motivation that I see in the eyes of college students http://t.co/Y15jVENfVH
I asked the students to have great dreams and a high level of knowledge and to prove to everyone that the people of the UAE are qualified, creative and able to make a difference in their home country

I also met with the university administration and put them in front of a new challenge, we asked them to progress 10 degrees annually in the world ranking of the university .. We want the best education for our children
Education is a priority .. and follow-up to its development will be directly .. The next phase of growth in the state requires an advanced level of output of higher education ..

Bilkent City Hospital will be the first in Turkey. A patient coming here will be able to meet all their needs from here.
In addition to this project we will also lay the foundations of a second city hospital in Ankara Etlik. We will do 15 city hospitals in Turkey.
With the completion of these hospitals, we will have a new turn in the health field.
In today's world, progress can not be achieved with progress and development that is separate from its own region, neighbors, and the world.
As Turkey, we are fighting for our peace and stability, as well as for the peace and stability of our region.
When reforming to solve our problems inside, we want to establish good relations with the countries in the region and provide stability there.
